languages.text: "Преподобный Адальберт, Ваша Светлость. Мне, скромному слуге Императора, доверен высокий пост Корабельного исповедника, сиречь первого духовного лица на вашем судне. Мне должно следить за чистотой веры экипажа. Я провожу служение в офицерской часовне и присматриваю за корабельным реликварием".

traits.locale_text: "Преподобный Адальберт, Ваша Светлость. Мне, скромному слуге Императора, доверен высокий пост Корабельного исповедника, сиречь первого духовного лица на вашем судне. Мне должно следить за чистотой веры экипажа. Я провожу служение в офицерской часовне и присматриваю за корабельным реликварием".

languages.text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."
languages.original_text: "Преподобный Адальберт, Ваша Светлость. Мне, скромному слуге Императора, доверен высокий пост Корабельного исповедника, сиречь первого духовного лица на вашем судне. Мне должно следить за чистотой веры экипажа. Я провожу служение в офицерской часовне и присматриваю за корабельным реликварием".

languages.text: «Confesor Adalbert, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como humilde sirviente del Emperador, se me ha confiado el gran honor de cumplir con las funciones de confesor de la nave, o, en otras palabras, de ser la mayor autoridad espiritual en su nave. Estoy aquí para supervisar la pureza de la fe de la tripulación. Oficio servicios religiosos en la capilla de oficiales y también cuido del relicario de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

languages.text: 「聴罪師アダルバートです、陛下。皇帝の忠実な従者として、私はこの船の聴罪師…言い換えると、この船に置ける精神的な最高権威という名誉をお預かりしております。私がここにいるのは、乗組員の信仰の健全性を監督するためです。士官の礼拝堂で礼拝を執り行い、また、船の聖骨箱の管理もしております」
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

languages.text: “告解神父阿达伯特愿为您效劳，大人。我是帝皇卑微的仆人，有幸成为这艘船上的告解神父。换句话说，我是这艘船上的最高精神权威。我负责监督船员的信仰是否纯洁。我会在军官礼拜堂主持祭拜仪式，也负责照看船上的圣骨匣。”
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

languages.text: "Konfessor Adalbert, Eure {mf|Lordschaf|Ladyschaft}. Als bescheidener Diener des Imperators genieße ich die große Ehre, der Konfessor dieses Schiffes zu sein, oder anders gesagt, die höchste spirituelle Autorität auf Eurem Raumschiff. Ich bin hier, um die Reinheit des Glaubens der Crew zu überwachen. Ich stehe der Offizierskapelle vor und kümmere mich um das Reliquiar des Schiffes."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

languages.text: « Confesseur Adalbert, Votre Seigneurie. En tant qu'humble serviteur de l'Empereur, j'ai eu l'insigne honneur d'être nommé confesseur ou, en d'autres termes, la plus haute autorité spirituelle de ce vaisseau. Je suis ici pour veiller à la pureté de la foi de votre équipage. J'officie dans la chapelle des officiers et suis également en charge du reliquaire. »
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

languages.text: "Bendeniz Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator'un mütevazı bir hizmetkârı olarak geminin günah çıkarıcısı olma şerefi bana emanet edildi. Başka bir deyişle geminizdeki en yüksek ruhani otoriteye sahibim. Vazifem, mürettebatın inancının saflığını denetlemek. Subay şapelinde görev yapıyorum. Ayrıca geminin kutsal emanet odasına da göz kulak oluyorum."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."
